sense.def:
Pleasure
je občutek veselja, zadoščenja ali ugodja.

seg.quote: McPherson could scarcely conceal his pleasure at my resignation.
I'd travel a thousand miles just for the pleasure of meeting you.

sense.def:
Pleasure
je tudi dejavnost, ki je ne opravljamo po dolžnosti, ampak ob njej uživamo.

seg.quote: She is a disciplined creature who will put duty before pleasure.

sense.def:
A pleasure
je dejavnost ali doživetje, ki je prijetno in nam daje zadovoljstvo.

Izraza
it's a pleasure
ali
my pleasure
uporabljamo kot vljuden odgovor, kadar se nam nekdo zahvali, ker smo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: ‘Thank you for talking to us about your research.’—‘It's a pleasure.’

sense.def:
With pleasure
je vljuden odgovor, da smo pripravljeni nekaj narediti;
